sourcesContent: import { Typography } from '@material-ui/core' import GridContainer from 'components/Grid/GridContainer' import GridItem from 'components/Grid/GridItem' import ViewInfoActionModal from 'components/ReactTableActions/ViewInfo/ViewInfoActionModal' const ViewConfiguracionInfoModal = ({ viewInfo, closeViewInfoModal, info }) => { const { id_configuracion, parametro, valor, descripcion } = info return ( ID: {id_configuracion} Par치metro: {parametro} Valor: {valor} Descripci칩n: {descripcion} } /> ) } export default ViewConfiguracionInfoModal
